nodes.text: Zep Sulgo was a prominent collector who was active during the war between the First Order and the Resistance. Sulgo was one of several wealthy clients prioritized by the Ithorian collector Dok-Ondar, owner of the store Dok-Ondar's Den of Antiquities on the planet Batuu. The historian Eloc Throno referenced Sulgo and Dok-Ondar in his book Traveler's Guide to Batuu.
Zep Sulgo was first mentioned in the 2020 reference book Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge: Traveler's Guide to Batuu, written by Cole Horton.
